title: GOF 01 — Blood type frequencies (P-value)
prompt_html:
Public health researchers are studying whether a clinic’s blood type distribution matches a known population distribution. The claimed proportions are shown below along with the observed counts from a sample of 200 cases.

CategoryObservedExpected proportion
O960.46
A880.40
B90.11
AB70.03

Using a chi-squared goodness-of-fit test, what is the P-value?

title: GOF 01 — Blood type frequencies (decision at 5%)
prompt_html: At the 5% significance level, do the data appear to fit the claimed distribution?

title: GOF 02 — Clinic blood-pressure categories (P-value)
